item.title: Does Reiki Healing Work? Scientifically Proven Efficacy
item.description: Experts from Warsha University have conducted a study to answer the question that has been on the minds of many people - does Reiki healing work? Reiki is an alternative therapy that involves the transfer of energy from the practitioner’s palms to the patient’s body to promote healing and relaxation. Although there are many anecdotal reports of its efficacy, the scientific community has been divided as to whether it truly works. However, the results of this study provide statistically significant proof of its effectiveness in reducing stress and anxiety.
